body:
Hello everyone, I wanted to make this thread to find out what are on your bucket lists. It could be Avicus related or non avicus related.

Here's mine:

Et's Bucket List:
• Get my profile picture on the Staff page
• Sky Dive (IRL)
• 10k Kills
• Get the badge I always wanted ✔
• Talk to Kylo and be his friend...
and many more...

so yeah, you get the jist, what's yours?
body_tagged:

title: Bucket List?

replies.body: Meh, I've never been a big fan of bucket lists. I've always felt that they've been too impulsive, and I'd be disappointed when I, more likely than not, didn't get to do many of those things. So, I just chill and do fun stuff when the opportunity presents itself c:
replies.body_tagged: Meh, I've never been a big fan of bucket lists. I've always felt that they've been too impulsive, and I'd be disappointed when I, more likely than not, didn't get to do many of those things. So, I just chill and do fun stuff when the opportunity presents itself c:

replies.body: In Avicus, I would hope to achieve 100,000 kills, 1000 monument breaks, and maybe get 1st place in Nexus! I sorta achieved 1st place in Nexus for a couple weeks, but then TarheelKiwi destroyed me and then I lost confidence, he a meanie D: (jk he kewl <3)

replies.body:
• Get a score more than 100 on Gamer (Endless Mode) in Game & Wario (If you don't know what that is, I suggest you look it up. Really fun.)
  • Get a girlfriend (like Tanpopo said)
  • Create a YouTube account and create a channel with a variety of videos
  • Become at least a Jr. Mod, which will hopefully be soon
  • Make people not view me as obnoxious and/or stupid :(
  • Pull under 7 minutes on a 2k (in crew)
  • Personally witness the explosion made by putting cesium metal into water
  • Learn how to speak German
  • Make more friends (possibly here? :D)
replies.body_tagged:
• Get a score more than 100 on Gamer (Endless Mode) in Game & Wario (If you don't know what that is, I suggest you look it up. Really fun.)
  • Get a girlfriend (like Tanpopo said)
  • Create a YouTube account and create a channel with a variety of videos
  • Become at least a Jr. Mod, which will hopefully be soon
  • Make people not view me as obnoxious and/or stupid :(
  • Pull under 7 minutes on a 2k (in crew)
  • Personally witness the explosion made by putting cesium metal into water
  • Learn how to speak German
  • Make more friends (possibly here? :D)

replies.body:
• Youtube (especially to record on Avicus and maybe other servers i enjoy)
  • Get no. 1 on Avicus (Nebula) DTM weekly's
  • 10k Kills
  • 3.0 KDR on stats page
  • Learn how to do graphics/art (whether minecraft related or not)
  • Get the badge i want
  • Get stuck in Sword Art Online for 2 years to clear the game
  • Become more Interactive (IRL and Online/Ingame)
  • Get into a relationship
  • Pass College in Fine Arts/ Multimedia Arts in graphics and animations and possibly get a Job in PIXAR!
  • Make Minecraft Animations based on players and other scenarios
  • Win (with my class) in the finals of my School Intramurals (Olympics) for Soccer and maybe Overall Winner of our batch/year level
  • Learn how to speak japanese
  • Get Donor Rank on Avicus

replies.body:
For learning how to create graphics, go to:

 https://www.khanacademy.org/computing/computer-programming

And you will learn how to use graphics and create animations in just under a week.

 Watch the videos and find out more! :D

And you will learn how to use graphics and create animations in just under a week.

 Watch the videos and find out more! :D
